name: rosie
text: Emeril's mad trashspotting skills are put to excellent use. Good sleuthing, E.

name: jamers
text: CSI: Trashspotting

name: skiddyfisk
text: It's really revealing of what an intelligent group of folks Beef hangs with.

name: shinkusan
text: The only thing that bothers me about them is that Emeril doesn't believe the moon landing happened. I can see that in Lyle (and he doesn't either) but I would think Emeril would be smart about it. I guess intelligence and a wide range of knowledge about literature can attract conspiracy theorizing, but STILL.

name: professorhazard
text: Law & Order: UTI

name: atticusonline
text: I don't think I want to watch any show about Urinary tract infections.

name: psquid
text: Your loss.

name: chrissketch
text: Oh wow, I had totally forgotten about trashspotting. I remember getting quite a chuckle out of it first time around.

name: dnai
text: the bear is visibly shaken

name: epicurus
text:
Mad props to the first five panels.

Also the way the trash-hobo thinks there is a distinction between having a dollar and having a dollar your mommy gabe you.

name: mcnubbins
text: A comment left by mcnubbins was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by sevenarts, MisterSpook, Footbullet)

name: epicurus
text: You seem to know an awful lot about this Mr. ... Mcnubbins, was it?

name: malachi
text: Why don't you have a seat over there...

name: hellofyellin
text: Little Teodor just wanted to pet that duck.  Tragic.

name: achilleselbow
text: This still happens to me. I see a cute fuzzy animal and I just want to pet it, but they always run away, and in the distance I can hear them mocking "quack quack you have no father quack quack".

name: greenkoolayd
text: need a hug?

name: lolsworth
text: All waterfowl are jerks.

name: rumblefish
text: In my Achewood that is also the duck that bit Pat.

name: mercuri0us
text: I don't uh I don't think ducks live that long.

name: riotdejaneiro
text: Well that certainly applies to the one that bit Pat and made him a vegulon.

name: stuntman
text: this is how his childhood was ended.

name: redjoker
text: there's joke in here about T never getting the chick but i just can't bring myself to it.

name: hollis
text: Although when it comes to taking care of himself, Roast Beef can be pretty useless, when Philippe is in danger, he rises to the occasion.  Nice.

name: luckyg
text: When you have depression, there's nothing better for you than helping a friend.

name: overmedicated
text: Agreed. HELLA agreed.

name: dak
text:
Seconded.
To the MAX.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: This is the truest thing.

name: slalvation
text: A comment left by slalvation was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by divot, NeoNaoNeo, Semiquaver, skjames)

name: heccibiggs
text:
Four lames?

People hate that you are helpful.

name: stuntman
text: someday you may be tricked.  Keep your friends close, and your enemies closer.

name: mrectomy
text: This is valuable life advice. Not even joking.

name: greenkoolayd
text: word to thy mother.

name: dumbeast
text: I'm pretty sure that this is the reason that Others exist.

name: blarghamagarky
text: that is because he has wicked sack

name: saint
text: undead squirrels pay better attention than trash hobos looking for dollars.

name: dougthehead
text: There is not nearly enough Emeril & Spongebath in Achewood, but whenever they come on they don't disappoint.

name: unsentletter
text: It's hard because Spongebath can't do the varied terrain stuff.

name: phillipe83
text: i think i had young teodor's sweatshirt as a child.

name: catachresis
text: Philippe is just priceless in the last panel here

name: stuntman
text: BROWN COUCH!

name: thommy_h
text: There is so much to enjoy in this strip. Child Teodor, the music in Beef's car, trashspotting put to good use and, of course, crabby Phillipe.

name: gouldgonewild
text: How many times has Beef's car been portrayed as playing Lovely Rita?

name: mercuri0us
text: two

name: tellumo
text: Honestly, Téodor, what are you doing with those $6 cans of pork and beans and a $300 antique ladle? And why are you leaving them lying around where Philippe can get at them? I thought you were all about the whole cheap-gourmet thing and all that.

name: ttagxamm
text: And it's funny the way he's keeping his shit together by focusing on material goods.  He knows his irresponsibility started this whole mess, but he can't help letting his guilt slop over into a bit of resentment.

name: tekende
text: And I'll bet those six-dollar pork and beans are no better than an 89-cent can of Van de Camp's pork and beans you can buy at Walmart like a normal person.

name: centipede_damascus
text: I do wonder what that bum is going to do with a dollar that Philipe would give him.

name: tellumo
text: Do you really need to ask?

name: tombsgrave
text: Baby Teodor is cute as dickens gets.  Also, Onstad writes 5-year-olds perfectly.

name: patkun
text: ~What the Hell is Téodor wearing as trousers? Are those like renaissance pantaloons?

name: hollis
text: I have often wondered this myself.

name: rumblefish
text: Not every stuffed animal as the luxury of being able to change it's clothes easily. Theodore is likely cursed with permanently stitched on pantaloons...and patent leather heeled knee high boots I guess?

name: cracklewater
text:
Theodore? Theodore?

It's Tacodore, nucka!

T%uFFFDodor would also have been acceptable.

name: silvereyes
text: Cursed?

name: peterjoel
text: I imagine Spongebath's voice to be exactly the same as the nerdy fat guy from the Simpsons, who works in the comic book store

name: magnusbuchan
text: too bad Spongebath doesn't really talk.

name: overmedicated
text: [b] PAY ATTENTION! [/i]

name: overmedicated
text: Apparently I wanted to start in bold but end in italics. I shall braqce myself for the lames/death threats.

name: ttagxamm
text:
No outcry from me, just a gentle admonition to heed Philippe's--and your own--suggestion:

PAY ATTENTION!

name: woodenteeth
text:
braqce.

it wasn't your day at all.

name: yearsinhotclaws
text: And The Achewood Presidential Award for Cunt-Slammingest Fuck Up goes to...

name: ted0phile
text: Cunt-Slammingest Fuck Up was the name of the band I started in junior high.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: I love how tough Phillipe gets in the last panel.

name: falseprophet
text: A comment left by falseprophet was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tekende, fosters, Ceres, Doc_Rostov, blarghamagarky)

name: professorhazard
text: Pretty sure the anchor is just indicative of baby clothes. Ray wears a similar getup when Todd steals his thong.

name: fosters
text: You are trying WAY too fucking hard to be deep, and it's kind of annoying.

name: woodenteeth
text: falseprophet. this bullshit is inspired. tongue in cheek, yes?

name: falseprophet
text:
In a way, yes. I am well-versed in the art of liberal arts English-paper writing. If the academy got off their asses and started teaching Achewood in schools, this is something I probably would have written for a class and gotten a fairly good grade on.

So it is not completely sincere but it is not sincerely tongue-in-cheek since I may have to make a living as a literary critic like this someday.

name: woodenteeth
text: So, tongue in cheek then. Your cognitive dissonance notwithstanding. I studied Lit and Creative Writing... and now, quite obviously, Psychology. I can be a convincing wanker too. It pays the bills now!

name: edthehead
text:
Or perhaps it is a Lacanian statement on the nature of the lack and the elusiveness of the phallus. Teodor is drawn to the duck by the objet petite a, but then is kept from progressing any closer to the kernel of the Real by his own mental self-defenses. Then, he suffers.

(I'm being tongue in cheek, but this is still how I immediately interpreted the first half of this strip).

name: tragicone
text: This received a 5 on the merit of Teodor chasing and loosing that duckling.

name: zem
text:
hang on a sec

why do they need small bills?

name: fineoakstructure
text:
because the transients on the way, and from whom they'll need help in order to find Philippe, are generally expecting "dollars that your mommy gabe you" as a reward for their complicity in the recovery.

Uh, the bums will want some cash if they're gonna answer questions. That's probably what I should've said.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Onstad: Into the Memory Box

-Emeril-
Big update tonight.
Trashspotting Manifesto, 1st Edition.

name: lolsworth
text: Poor Li'l Téodor.

name: puguglypress
text: Emeril uses his trashspotting skills to help the guys rescue Phillippe! That is some badass plotting!
